solution_line_template: Ivan wants to bake {num_mini_pies} pies which use {apples_per_mini_pie} an apple each, {num_mini_pies} pies x {apples_per_mini_pie} apple each = <<{num_mini_pies}*{apples_per_mini_pie}={apples_used_for_mini_pies}>>{apples_used_for_mini_pies} apples
Ivan uses {apples_used_for_mini_pies} of his {initial_apples} apples, {initial_apples} - {apples_used_for_mini_pies} = {apples_leftover} apples
